price: 69. ¿O acaso no reconocen al Mensajero enviado a ellos (Muhammad) y por eso lo desmienten?
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يَعۡرِفُواْ رَسُولَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: am lam yaʿrifū rasūlahum fahum lahu munkirūna
